entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.

text: @YourAnonCentral Maybe because do the coronavirus? You fucking retards. I understand why people are out there right now, but don’t fucking dare make people feel bad for not going out. I’d rather not catch an illness.
